content.prompt_es: Complete the sentences with the correct words related to lectures and presentations.
content.main_text: When attending a lecture, it is important to take (1)___ to help remember key points. (2)___ are often used to illustrate concepts and engage the audience. The lecturer usually provides a (3)___ at the beginning to outline the main ideas. Effective (4)___ can greatly enhance the delivery of a presentation. Lastly, during the Q&A session, students should feel free to (5)___ any unclear points.
content.explanation:
(1) Es importante tomar notas durante una conferencia para recordar los puntos clave.
(2) Los recursos visuales son útiles para ilustrar conceptos durante las presentaciones.
(3) Una visión general ayuda a los estudiantes a entender qué esperar de la conferencia.
(4) La comunicación efectiva es crucial para transmitir ideas claramente.
(5) Es importante que los estudiantes hagan preguntas para aclarar dudas.
